txt.en: With minds of their own, the siege-trolls of Gundabad may prove even more terrible than the weapons of war forged in Ashmâr-zarakh.
Mission: Engines of Flesh and Stone
'Nicely done, [placeholder]! Those siege-trolls did not prove to be much of a match for you! Let us return and report your success to Hórin!'
Your mission is to defeat the siege-trolls of Ashmâr-zarakh.
